snippet.title: Ephemeral Tale x Shadows of Adam Crossover Event Trailer
snippet.description:
A rift has opened between two worlds-- what will make its way through? Check out new enemies, gear, bosses, and more in this new update for Ephemeral Tale! Includes two special guest tracks by Tyler Mire, the composer of Shadows of Adam and the upcoming Quartet!

A huge THANK YOU to Something Classic for all of their support in making this come to life!

Check out Ephemeral Tale on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1204320/Ephemeral_Tale/

Check out Shadows of Adam on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/506510/Shadows_of_Adam/
